mutabledataset¶

class mutabledataset.GermanSimDataset(*args, **kwargs)¶

Inherits from AIF360s GermanDataset and mutabledataset.simmixin.SimMixin. Some additional pre-processing is done here.

class mutabledataset.simmixin.SimMixin(mutable_features=[], domains={}, cost_fns={}, discrete=[])¶

Mixin, extending AIF360s StructuredDataset with functionalities necessary for the simulation

Parameters

  • mutable_features – List of feature names which are mutable

  • domains – Dict specifying the domain for each feature

  • cost_fns – Dict specifying cost functions (lambda) for each feature.

  • discrete – List of discrete feature names.

_continuous_and_mutable()¶
Returns

Continious and mutable feature names.

_dedummy_code_obj(obj, sep='=')¶
Parameters

  • obj – Instance (feature values) in object form (dict)

  • sep – Seperator used for dummy coding

Returns

dedummy coded object

Returns

Discrete and mutable feature names.

Parameters

_ft_index(ft)¶
Parameters

ft – Feature name

Returns

index of feature (position in dataframe)

_get_domain(ft)¶

Infers domain of feature. :param ft: Feature name :returns: Domain

_is_dummy_coded(ft)¶
Parameters

ft – Feature name

Returns

True if ft is dummycoded

continuous_domains()¶
Returns

Continious domains.

discrete_permutations()¶
Returns

Iterator over all possible feature value combinations for discrete mutable features.

dynamic_cost(X_new, X)¶

Returns cost of feature manipulation (as defined in self.cost_fns) from X to X_new. :param X_new: Feature matrix (dimension n_instances x n_features) :param X: Feature matrix (dimension n_instances x n_features) :returns: List (dimension n_instances x 1) with manipulation cost.

enforce_dummy_coded(X)¶

Enforces that for dummycoded features exactly one feature is set to 1, all the others to 0. Called after gradient ascend.

Parameters

X – Feature matrix (dimension n_instances x n_features)

Returns

X’ (modified feature matrix)

infer_domain()¶

Automatically infers domain for features where domain was set to ‘auto’

obj_to_vector(obj)¶
Parameters

obj – Instance (feature values) in object form (dict)

Returns

Instance (feature values) in vector form

rank_fns()¶

Precomputes the rank functions, which may be used in cost functions. Note that this function creates one rank funktion per protected group and feature.

scale_dummy_coded(X)¶

Ensures that the values for one dummy-coded feature sum up to 1 (scales accordingly). Called during gradient ascend. You may find an in-depth explanation in the write-up.

Parameters

X – Feature matrix (dimension n_instances x n_features)

Returns

X’ (modified feature matrix)

vector_to_object(vec)¶
Parameters

vec – Instance (feature values) in vector form

Returns

Instance (feature values) in object form (dict)
